Adapted for Google Colab and nbdev from xstreamsrl jupytemplate. See xtreamsrl blog post for rational.

GPU info¶

versions[source]

versions()

Checks if GPU enabled and if so displays device details with cuda, pytorch, fastai versions

def show_gpu():
  "check if GPU runtime enabled and if so give details"
  !nvidia-smi

def empty_gpu_cache(mem=True):
  "Empty GPU cache. Show new GPU memory if `mem=True`"
  torch.cuda.empty_cache()
  if mem: 
    !nvidia-smi

CPU RAM¶

show_ram_usage[source]

show_ram_usage()

purge_mem[source]

purge_mem(vars=None, mem=True)

Delete vars and recycle CPU memory. Show new RAM if mem=True

Dataframe memory usage¶

show_df_mem_usage[source]

show_df_mem_usage(df)

Check dataframe df memory use

reduce_df_mem_usage[source]

reduce_df_mem_usage(df, verbose=True)

Reduce size of dataframe df columns to minimise memory usage
